Module PA2
Package model

Class LevelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.LevelManager
  • public class LevelManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the current GameLevel and level name. Also tracks information that's related to this game level but not specific to the map of the game level, i.e. how long the player has been playing the level, how many restarts, etc.

      • getGameLevel

        public GameLevel getGameLevel()

      • loadLevelNamesFromDisk

        public void loadLevelNamesFromDisk()
        Clears and loads the the level names into levelNames. Can be done succinctly using Streams, Predicates, and Consumers. Load the files by alphabetical sorted order.

        Hints: Files.walk(Paths.get(mapDirectory), 1) returns a Stream of files 1 folder deep

      • getLevelNames

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getLevelNames()

      • currentLevelNameProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty currentLevelNameProperty()

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel​(java.lang.String levelName)
              throws InvalidMapException
        Sets the current level based on the level name (i.e. the map filename). Although the level existed duration should be reset, the timer should not be started yet.

        Hints: don't forget to update the level name and existed duration properties, and load the map for the GameLevel object.

        Parameters:
        levelName - The level name to set
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - if the map was invalid

      • startLevelTimer

        public void startLevelTimer()
        Starts the timer, which updates curGameLevelExistedDuration every second.

        Hint: Timer.scheduleAtFixedRate(TimerTask, long, long) and Platform.runLater(Runnable) are required

      • resetLevelTimer

        public void resetLevelTimer()
        Cancels the existing timer and assigns it to a new instance

      • incrementNumRestarts

        public void incrementNumRestarts()
        Increment the number of restarts the user has performed on the current GameLevel

      • resetNumRestarts

        public void resetNumRestarts()
        Reset the number of restarts the user has performed on the current GameLevel

      • getNextLevelName

        public java.lang.String getNextLevelName()
        Returns:
        The name of the level which appears immediately after the current level name inside levelNames. If the current level is the last level, this function returns null. You may assume that the current level name is always valid.

      • curGameLevelExistedDurationProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty curGameLevelExistedDurationProperty()

        public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty curGameLevelNumRestartsProperty()
